title: Trimming, early 19th century
medium: White and colored silk in velvet weave.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection
description: Two shields, each under a crown.  One shows a rampant lion standing on a hill (?).  The other shows a castle.  Colors are red, blue, yellow, and green on a white ground with a border of red and white blocks.

tombstone.epitaph:
Trimming, early 19th century.
early 19th century. White and colored silk in velvet weave.. Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection. 1943-46-62.
